title: Aarieer Automatic Watch
summary: Stylis and professional looking Watch Face engineerd with Swiss precision.
description: Aarieer Automatic Watch is a cool looking watch face for your Wearable device. The clock is designed to run on different round and square devices (LG G Watch, Moto360, etc.)Features:* Android Wear Watch Face* Designed with Swiss precision.* Ambient mode supported (Black and white design to protect your OLED screen)Installation:Install the application and the Watch Face will be automatically visible on your compatibile device. To activate the Watch Face, long press on your watch home page, look for the newly installed Watch Face and select it.Requirements:*Android Wear device 5.0.1 or higher*Android 5.0.1 or higher
descriptionHTML:
Aarieer Automatic Watch is a cool looking watch face for your Wearable device. The clock is designed to run on different round and square devices (LG G Watch, Moto360, etc.)

Features:
* Android Wear Watch Face
* Designed with Swiss precision.
* Ambient mode supported (Black and white design to protect your OLED screen)

Installation:
Install the application and the Watch Face will be automatically visible on your compatibile device. To activate the Watch Face, long press on your watch home page, look for the newly installed Watch Face and select it.

Requirements:
*Android Wear device 5.0.1 or higher
*Android 5.0.1 or higher
comments: Boring, not able to customize The included Moto 360 watch face are more attractive, this should be free. There're better free watch face to download, I wasted my money.
Do not like the ambient mode Looks good until it is in ambient mode

Elegant and simple Using an LG Urbane and this is only one of two watch faces out of dozens I've tried that is in my regular rotation of use. It's not flashy, interactive etc, but that is fine for me. I want a watch face to tell time and to show off the piece and this face does it. Lots of compliments received and loving the fact it's rocking a Swiss logo, dying for a victorinox esquire watch face and this comes close. Thanks Dev!
recentChanges: -Tested for multiple resolutions (320x320, 320x290, 400x400, etc.) as well as for round and square devices
